starter_village.name: Harmonia Village
starter_village.description: A peaceful starting village where adventurers begin their journey

cave_dungeon.name: Whispering Cave
cave_dungeon.description: A dark cave filled with slimes and bats. Strange whispers echo through the tunnels.

forest_dungeon.name: Corrupted Forest
forest_dungeon.description: A once-beautiful forest twisted by meta-corruption. Reality bends here.

capital_city.name: Scriptura
capital_city.description: The capital city. Home to the Scriptweaver's Guild.

suburban_overworld.name: Suburbia
suburban_overworld.description: A cheerful 90s suburban town. Something feels... off.

steampunk_overworld.name: Cogsworth Junction
steampunk_overworld.description: A Victorian-era clockwork city at the boundary between medieval and suburban. Brass pipes hiss, gas lamps flicker, and mechanical sentinels patrol the cobblestone streets.

industrial_overworld.name: The Efficiency District
industrial_overworld.description: A factory complex where everything has been optimized for production. Workers are numbered, breaks are scheduled, and individuality is inefficient.

futuristic_overworld.name: The Network
futuristic_overworld.description: A digital cityscape optimized for computation. Buildings are server farms. Streets are data highways. People are I/O terminals.

abstract_overworld.name: The Remainder
abstract_overworld.description: Everything unnecessary has been removed. Color, detail, names â€” all optimized away. What remains is pure geometry, pure function, pure... nothing.
